Crimes.Crime_Name: Using false identity for immigration purposes
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of the Officer's decision to deny H&C application
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant misrepresented identity and continued misleading authorities
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Lack of evidence showing disproportionate hardship upon return to India
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Humanitarian and compassionate considerations based on establishment in Canada
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Proof of unusual or disproportionate hardship
Crimes.Application_Error: Use of false identity for entry and refugee claim
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Unusual or disproportionate hardship required for exemption
Crimes.Application_Factor: Establishment in Canada, family ties, length of residence
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the Officer’s assessment was reasonable
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Misrepresentation and lack of proof of unique hardship
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient evidence of hardship in India
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant and family used false identities; ongoing deception
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Application for humanitarian and compassionate relief
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review in administrative decisions

Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of refusal of H&C application
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant used fraudulent means and misrepresented identity
Crimes.Evidence_Type: No substantial evidence of disproportionate hardship
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Request for exemption based on H&C grounds
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Proof of unusual or disproportionate hardship
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Fraudulent conduct outweighed establishment in Canada
Crimes.Application_Error: Misrepresentation in refugee claim and status application
Crimes.Application_Factor: Length of stay, integration, family in Canada
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Discovery of misrepresentation and fraudulent claim
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of sufficient evidence of hardship
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of false identity and fraudulent claims
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Sustained deception regarding identity and status
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Appeal based on humanitarian and compassionate grounds
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Scope of judicial review under IRPA
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose true marital or personal status

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of assessment of establishment and hardship
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant misrepresented identity and misled authorities
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Insufficient evidence of hardship upon return to India
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Claim for permanent residence based on H&C grounds
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Proof of unusual or disproportionate hardship
Crimes.Application_Error: False identity at entry and continued deception
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of hardship and establishment evaluation
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of credible evidence supporting hardship claim
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to denial of H&C application
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review in administrative law
Crimes.Omission_Type: Non-disclosure of true nationality and identity

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of assessment of establishment and hardship claims
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant misrepresented identity and submitted a fraudulent refugee claim
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Lack of evidence of unusual hardship in India or exceptional establishment in Canada
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Request for exemption due to hardship if forced to apply from India
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Proof of unusual and undeserved hardship
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Fraudulent claim and misrepresentation undermined H&C arguments
Crimes.Application_Error: False refugee claim based on fabricated identity
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Need to demonstrate exceptional circumstances for H&C relief
Crimes.Application_Factor: Integration in Canada, family connections, time since arrival
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Validity of Officer’s evaluation of hardship and credibility
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to provide credible documentation of hardship
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Adherence to procedural requirements in decision-making
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of false identity in initial and subsequent applications
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Pattern of deception from entry onward
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Judicial review scope and standard of review
Crimes.Omission_Type: Concealment of true identity and origin
